f.tit: 1. INITIALIZATION, START-OF-SELECTION, AT START-OF- SELECTION, AT START-OF-SELECTION OUTPUT. correct order ?
f.a: a) LOAD PROGRAM, INITIALIZATION, AT START-OF-SELECTION OUTPUT, AT START-OF-SELECTION, START-OF-SELECTION
f.b: b) Obviously changing the order for rest of the options.

f.tit: 2. Components of Netweaver . (2 correct answers)
3. Which of the following part of SAP business suite (3 Answers)
4. Size of Integer.
f.d: d) Assigns as you declare the value.

f.tit: 5. There are two classes CL_SUPER and CL_SUB. Class CL_SUPER has method say SUPER_METHOD and CL_SUB has a method SUB_METHOD.DATA: GO_SUPER type ref to CL_SUPER,GO_SUB type ref to CL_SUB.
f.b: b) GO_SUPER->SUB_METHOD. (i CHOSE THIS BUT PLEASE READ THE Q WELL)

f.tit: 6. What you can do in class builder. (3 correct answers) (A NEW Q!!)
f.a: a) Local class and Local interface from your local program.
f.c: c) When you can define global class, you can use in F8 Function.

f.tit: 7. What are the components of ABAP Workbench. (3 ans)
8. In a table, when buffering settings are switched on and buffering style is single, What would be the option ?
9. Relationship between Buffering and Index.
f.a: a) When retrieving a record using index, you can`t use Buffer.

f.tit: 10. What is defined in ABAP Dictionary ? (3 ans)
11. What are the components of elementary Search help. (3 ans) - (One more new q!!)
12. What are the parameters of Functional method. (2 ans) - [i dnt hav t giv d ans here :P]
13. Order of ALV Grid Control.
f.a: a) Create Container / ALV grid / Pass the values.
f.b: b) Of course change the order (:P)

f.tit: 14. When you press Double_Click, What will happen. (3 ans)
f.c: c) event handler class method triggers

f.tit: 15. How you will define BADI.
f.b: b) Define Class which describes interface.

f.tit: 16. When is the authorization of user checked for entering data.
17. If you want the data in the internal table to be copied without using the header line.., how will you pass
f.a: a) Field symbols ASSIGNING ( someting like this). [correct answer]

f.tit: 18. How can you debug the program (3 answer)
f.c: c) set break point and execute
f.d: d) set watch point in the ABAP editor window

f.tit: 19. What can be done using watch point?
f.a: a) The contents of internal table can be changed.
f.b: b) Change the components of the structure.
f.c: c) Change the content of constants.

f.tit: 20. There is a local type variable defined gty_1. Which possible definition is allowed in ABAP Statement.
f.b: b) Data Var TYPE gty_1 Value 1.
f.d: d) Data Var TYPE gty_1 DEFAULT 1.

f.tit: 21. How can you define an internal table using a Transparent table
f.b: b) Data gt_itab line type of <transparent table>
f.c: c) Data gt_itab TYPE TABLE OF <table type.>
f.d: d) Data gt_itab like line of gt_itab.

f.tit: 22. Parameters for table type? (1 answers pass)
23. What is allowed in internal talbe? (3 ans)
24. Role of Database Interface.(3 ans)
f.a: a) Converts open SQL statements to the underlying suitable native SQL.

f.tit: 25. A and B are two tables, User wants the output in a way such that it should have allrecords common from Table A and Table B, and also contain records from table A.
f.a: a) Select... A Outer join B
f.d: d) Select... loop A into B.

f.tit: 26. Which modularization unit can be used cross client. ? (Good q!!)
27. What can be implemented using BADI`s? (3 ans)
28. What are the options, If you want to read data from Database, using select statement? (3ans)
29. What happen when authorization check has been rejected.
30. When user is allowed to use where clause.
31. When large table is buffered and there is a condition such that you always have to specify The full unique key of the table . Which table gives better access?
32. For a Database view, what are the required components?
f.a: a) The tables which you want to join.
f.b: b) The fields from different labels you want in view.
f.d: d) Select condition. (This is also possible but not compulsory)

f.tit: 33. A customer is doing changes in SAP source code.
34. How do you declare a internal table with the line type of a Transparent table?
f.b: b) Data it type line of <transparent table>.
f.c: c) Data it type structure of <transparent table>.

f.tit: 35. What are implicit enhancements used for?
36. You have two controllers A and B.A use B as used controller than which of B`s component A can use (2 answers)
37. Which of the following objects are DEEP ? (3 Answers)
f.b: b) Nested Structure / Nested Loop statement
f.d: d) Data type string with elementary type

f.tit: 38. Which table have one-to-one relationship with database table?
39. If you want to create structure in two table with same field C_TIME and C_DATE but with different name structure which method you will use?
f.c: c) Define the field in both tables separately.

f.tit: 40. How are Dialog step processed w.r.t work process in the application layer ?
f.a: a) A dialog work process is assigned till the end of each SAP LUW.
f.b: b) Usually, each dialog step is assigned to different work processes.
f.c: c) Different steps in different application servers.

f.tit: 41. What can we get using Code inspector? (3 Answers)
f.a: a) Possible to get to know the time for program execution.

f.tit: 42. What is the common between local and global types?
43. What are the components of domain ?(3 Answer)
44. You have classical (dynpro) screen. You want to add documentation for yourinput field. How you will do it? (2 ans)
f.a: a) Add documentation in data element of data dictionary
f.b: b) Use screen table component DOCUMENTATION to enter in the PBO.
f.c: c) POH (I forgot the full form).

f.tit: 45. How you can create Singleton class ? (3 Answer)
f.b: b) Create class with visibility private
f.c: c) Create instance of class in its static method
f.d: d) Create event to return the instance of class

f.tit: 46. You have got error with warning message for input field in a classical dynpro, how will you process it?
f.a: a) Enter the value and press Enter
f.b: b) Enter the value and Execute (F8)
f.c: c) Leave the field blank and press Enter
f.d: d) Leave the field blank and Execute (F8)

f.tit: 47. Which of the following conversion is invalid?
f.a: a) Xstring Type to String Type.
f.c: c) Char Type Value "123" into char type length "2"

f.tit: 48. Which of the following object have LEAD_SELECTION_INDEX( ) method ?
49. How will you call a subscreen as a dialog modal in a window ?
f.a: a) CALL SUBSCREEN STARTING AT 5 5 in flow logic
f.b: b) CALL SCREEN STARTING AT 5 5 abap editor
f.d: d) SET SUBSCREEN STARTING AT 5 5 in flow logic.

f.tit: 50. Task T1 is processed by a team O1 and team leader wants to release it.Another developer who is not from team O1 wants to do some changes in T1. When he can do changes ?
f.b: b) After O1 released the task T1.
f.c: c) During T1 is processed by O1.

f.tit: 51. You want to append table to append table.
f.a: a) Append structure start with ZZ or YY.
f.b: b) Fields of append structure start with ZZ or YY.

f.tit: 52. Parameters are used in .. (Select 3)
53. Which of following are controllers of Web Dynpro component? (3 ans)
54. when a user is using a update function module for updating the database and has realized that all the previous work should be undone to get back database to previous state.
